    {trigger: "$", replacement: "\$$0\$$1", options: "tA"},

    {trigger: "\\{", replacement: "\\{$0\\}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "($0)$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "{", replacement: "{$0}$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "[", replacement: "[$0]$1", options: "mA"},
    {trigger: "(", replacement: "\\left($0\\right", options: "m"},

    {trigger: "\\{", replacement: "\\left\\{$0\\right", options: "m"},

    {trigger: ">prek ", replacement: ">[!abstract]- Pre-knowledge\n>- ", options: "tA"},
